description: As a User I want to access orders section So I amend boookings
name: User should be able to amend boookings

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : Ensuring that a booking can be amended by removing an Adult

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'
I click the view button for an order in the orders table

steps.name: I ensure the order to be amended matches my last created order
I click the "Edit Order" Button beside "Go to Dashboard" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I proceed to change route by clicking the green swap location toggle
The "Commit Changes" Button should be Inactive
I edit the 'Who' section by removing '1x Adult'
I edit the 'Date' section by clicking the 'Next Day' button
I select a time for 'Add-Ons' Single Train ride
I select seats in the reservation compartment section
The "Commit Changes" Button should be Active
The "Refund" Button should be Active if The Sub Total is negative else the "Checkout" Button should be active where either button is the action button
I process a refund or checkout
I should see that the order completed successfully
I ckick the view order button to verify all changes are reflected
